title: [Large-Scale] Blended Learning Design Incorporating Vodcasts in Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic medical terminology and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: A blended course for healthcare institution managers/leaders combining self-directed learning via vodcasts with real-time discussions

learning_goals: Learners can acquire key medical concepts with an understanding rate of over 80% through VODCASTs
Learners can present critical questions/opinions at least twice in real-time discussions after watching VODCASTs
Learners can submit at least one plan for applying VODCAST-based learning content to actual work situations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
